Question: The ____ brothers Peyton and Eli have played against each other a few times in their professional careers.
Hints: This person was named a Pro Bowl starter; in the Pro Bowl, he threw 3 touchdowns in a 38–27 victory and was named the game's MVP.
The Colts lost 19–16 to the Super Bowl bound Titans and this person was limited to one touchdown run.
In a 35–3 victory against the Cincinnati Bengals, this person threw 3 TD passes while completing 26 of 32 passes for 277 yards.
